label: Xue, Qingquan & Ya-Lin Zhang.  2015. Five new species in the idiocerine genus Busonia Distant  (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Idiocerinae) from Thailand and Malaysia, with one new record from China. Zootaxa 4021(4): 541–552.
